distro_list.name: Get on RFQ Distro List
distro_list.subject: Reytech Inc. — SB/DVBE Vendor — Request to Join RFQ Distribution List
distro_list.body:
Hi {{name}},

My name is Mike from Reytech Inc. I wanted to reach out because {{agency}} recently purchased {{items}} — we supply those same categories and consistently offer competitive pricing on SCPRS.

We're a California-certified Small Business (SB) and Disabled Veteran Business Enterprise (DVBE), which helps meet your procurement mandates under CalTrans and DGS guidelines. We've been serving CA state agencies for several years.

I'd love the opportunity to get on {{agency}}'s RFQ distribution list so we can submit quotes for your next procurement. We turn around quotes quickly and our prices are typically 10–30% below current contract rates.

You can add us at sales@reytechinc.com or call/text 949-229-1575. I'm happy to provide our vendor registration, certifications, or a product catalog on request.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Mike
Reytech Inc. | SB/DVBE Certified
sales@reytechinc.com | 949-229-1575

initial_outreach.name: Initial Outreach
initial_outreach.subject: Reytech Inc. — Competitive Pricing on {{category}}
initial_outreach.body:
Hi {{name}},

This is Mike from Reytech Inc. I noticed {{agency}} recently purchased {{items}} ({{date}}). We carry those same types of items and often have more competitive pricing — typically 10–30% below current contract rates.

We're a certified Small Business (SB) and Disabled Veteran Business Enterprise (DVBE), which helps meet your procurement mandates. We'd love to get on your RFQ distribution list for future bids.

Please reach us at sales@reytechinc.com or 949-229-1575.

Best regards,
Mike | Reytech Inc. | SB/DVBE
sales@reytechinc.com | 949-229-1575

rfq_followup.name: RFQ Follow-Up
rfq_followup.subject: Following Up — Quote {{quote_number}} for {{agency}}
rfq_followup.body:
Hi {{name}},

Following up on Quote {{quote_number}} we sent on {{date}} for {{items}}.

Total: {{total}}. We're happy to clarify any pricing, adjust quantities, or answer questions about availability.

If you've already awarded this or it's no longer needed, just let us know and we'll update our records.

Best,
Mike | Reytech Inc.
sales@reytechinc.com | 949-229-1575

quote_won.name: Quote Won — Thank You
quote_won.subject: Thank You — PO {{po_number}} Confirmed | Reytech Inc.
quote_won.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for the award on PO {{po_number}}. Your order for {{items}} is being processed and you'll receive tracking information once shipped.

Expected delivery: {{delivery_date}}.

We look forward to continuing to serve {{agency}}. Please keep us on your distribution list — we're always competitive on pricing and delivery.

Best regards,
Mike | Reytech Inc.
sales@reytechinc.com | 949-229-1575

quote_lost.name: Quote Lost — Stay Warm
quote_lost.subject: Thank You for the Opportunity — {{agency}}
quote_lost.body:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for the opportunity to quote on {{items}}. We understand the award went elsewhere this time.

We'll keep monitoring upcoming SCPRS bids in your categories and would love another shot on your next procurement. We continuously work to improve our pricing and delivery times.

Please keep us on your distribution list — we're a certified SB/DVBE and always available at sales@reytechinc.com or 949-229-1575.

Best,
Mike | Reytech Inc.
sales@reytechinc.com | 949-229-1575

price_check_turnaround.name: Price Check / Quote Ready
price_check_turnaround.subject: Your Pricing — {{items}} | Quote {{quote_number}}
price_check_turnaround.body:
Hi {{name}},

Here is our pricing for the items you requested. Quote {{quote_number}} is attached.

We can ship within {{lead_time}} of PO receipt. Let me know if you need any adjustments.
